评论详情: I purchased these WOWSUN Retro sunglasses for my wife, and unfortunately, the experience was incredibly disappointing. The product photos online are seriously deceptive. The sunglasses arrived significantly oversized compared to what was depicted, rendering them unsuitable and unflattering. My wife was extremely upset. The size discrepancy alone warrants a poor rating, but the misleading advertising is the most frustrating aspect. If you're looking for retro sunglasses, I strongly advise looking elsewhere. Save yourself the time and money – these are simply not worth it.
